title: Block based Policies with Associated Alerts
display_title: Block based Policies with Associated Alerts
description: This widget is aimed to show all the block based policies which are of high severity and have alerts associated.

title: Policies Generating Maximum Alerts
description: This widget is aimed to show all the block based policies that have maximum alerts associated with it.

title: Policy Alert Posture
description: Provides a summary of policy alerts in your clusters, categorized into Block and Audit alerts, and further classified by severity levels. This helps users understand the alert distribution and prioritize actions based on severity and alert type.

title: Policies with Maximum Associated Workloads
description: This widget is aimed to show all the block based policies that have maximum active workloads associated with it.

title: Alert Summary
description: Offers a concise view of KubeArmor Alerts, helping users monitor security events and evaluate policy enforcement effectiveness at a glance.

title: Top 5 Namespace Specific Alerts
description: This widget highlights the top 5 namespaces generating the highest number of KubeArmor alerts, helping users prioritize security issues in the most affected namespaces.

title: Top 5 Namespace based Policies
description: Displays the top 5 namespaces with the highest number of violated policies, focusing on the count of violated policies rather than alerts. This helps identify namespaces with the most policy breaches.

title: Top 5 Policy Violations Across All Clusters
display_title: Top 5 Policy Violations Across All Clusters
description: Displays the top 5 clusters with the highest number of violated policies, focusing on the count of violated policies rather than alerts. This helps identify clusters with the most policy breaches.

title: Top 5 K8s External Egress/Ingress Workloads
description: Displays the top 5 workloads with the highest external connections, including both egress and ingress traffic to external sources. This helps users monitor and secure workloads with significant communication to the outside world.

title: Workload Alerts
description: Displays the top 5 workloads generating the highest number of KubeArmor alerts. This helps users identify and prioritize workloads requiring immediate security attention to mitigate potential risks.

title: KIEM Findings by Asset Types
description: Distribution of KIEM findings by asset types

title: Hardening Policy Coverage
description: Displays the count of applied hardening policies in your clusters. We recommend applying all hardening policies to strengthen cluster security.

title: Top 5 Hardening Policy Violations
description: Displays the hardening policies with the highest number of generated alerts, helping prioritize areas needing immediate attention.

title: KIEM Risk Assessment
description: Distribution of KIEM findings by criticality

title: Privileged Containers
description: This widget will display the number of privileged containers detected across all clusters. The purpose is to provide users with a clear overview of privileged container usage, helping them assess potential security risks.

title: Continuous Compliance
description: This widget shows policy coverage (activated vs. total policies) and runtime alerts by severity, tracked through KubeArmor policy compliance tags for compliance monitoring.

title: Privileged Containers by Clusters
description: This widget helps identify clusters with privileged containers, offering insights into potential security risks

title: K8s CIS Compliance Status
description: Monitors CIS Kubernetes compliance across all clusters, providing insights into security posture. Filter to drill down into specific cluster details.

title: K8s Open Findings
description: Provides a comprehensive risk assessment across Cluster Findings, KIEM, CIS, and Runtime Alerts. Highlights critical focus areas such as secrets, data access, binary executions, FIM, etc., helping users identify and address potential misconfigurations to improve cluster security.

title: Cluster Connection Status
description: Connection Status of Clusters which are onboarded.

title: Cluster Findings Summary by Severity
description: This widget provides a quick overview of the failed findings categorized by their severity levels, helping users identify the most critical issues at a glance.

title: Policy Coverage
description: Provides an overview of total policies, highlighting the count of active and inactive policies for both Kubernetes Network Policies and KubeArmor Network Policies.

title: K8s Risk Posture
description: This widget highlights key security metrics related to misconfigurations and vulnerabilities within your Kubernetes clusters, helping to identify and mitigate potential security risks.

title: K8s Risk Assesment by Cluster
description: Severity Risk Assesment by Cluster

title: Clusters with Public Exposure
description: The Kubernetes Network Exposure Widget is designed to provide real-time visibility into the external network exposure of Kubernetes workloads across different clusters. The widget will display data on whether workloads are connected to public or private IP addresses and will categorize the connections by ingress and egress flow types.

title: Root Privileged Pods by Clusters
description: Identifies pods running as root or can escalate to root, highlighting potential security risks.

title: Findings by Asset Categories
description: This widget categorizes failed findings by asset type and includes severity details, aiding users in pinpointing which asset categories and severities need immediate attention.

title: Top 5 K8s CIS Findings
description: This widget highlights the top 5 CIS benchmark findings in your Kubernetes clusters, sorted by criticality and affected assets. It helps prioritize remediation to improve cluster security and compliance.

title: K8s Findings Trend
description: This widget displays the number of CIS, KIEM, and Cluster findings over time with a trend line graph. Users can filter by cluster to track security and compliance trends, helping monitor and improve the security posture of Kubernetes clusters.

title: Workloads Without Any Policy Applied
description: This widget helps users identify workloads lacking any applied policies, enabling them to take corrective actions. It highlights the security risk by comparing workloads with policies to those without, emphasizing the need for policy enforcement to reduce vulnerabilities.

title: Workloads without Network Policies
description: This widget displays the number of workloads that lack network policies. The aim is to help users quickly identify potential security gaps where network policies are not enforced.

title: K8s Resource Summary
description: This widget displays key metrics related to resource limits, label usage, health checks, and best practices in your Kubernetes clusters.

title: Cluster Findings by Asset Type
description: This pie chart shows the proportion of security findings across different resource types in your Kubernetes clusters. Each slice represents a resource type (e.g., Pods, Services, Nodes), with its size indicating the number of findings. Hover over a slice for details.

title: Top 5 Most Critical Findings
description: Findings count for the most critical risks under KIEM

title: Top 5 Clusters Without Any Protection
description: Active Clusters with max workloads having no policies applied.

title: New Cluster Findings Trend
description: This provides an overview of the X-day trend, highlighting insights into the effectiveness of remediation efforts and overall cluster status (active/inactive).

title: Top 5 Cluster Findings
description: Providing an overview of the top findings and the number of affected resources.

title: Compliance Status
description: Shows individual compliance scores for each framework, helping you assess and compare adherence levels across different standards.

title: Findings Trends
description: Trend analysis showing daily analysis of the cloud findings in the environment

title: Opengrep Findings by Severity
description: Displays the total number of findings along with their severity distribution, helping users identify and prioritize security risks.

title: Opengrep Findings Trend
description: Trend analysis showing daily analysis of the Opengrep findings in the environment

title: New Cloud Findings Trend
description: Trend analysis showing daily analysis of the new cloud findings in the environment

title: New Opengrep Findings Trend
description: Trend analysis showing daily analysis of the newly discovered Opengrep findings in the environment

title: New Secret Scan Findings Trend
description: Trend analysis showing daily analysis of the newly discovered secret scan findings in the environment

title: Top 10 VMs with VM Vulnerability Findings
description: Displays the top 10 VMs with VM Vulnerability Findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful VMs with critical issues.

title: Top 10 VMs with Windows VM Vulnerability Findings
description: Displays the top 10 Windows VMs with Vulnerability Findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful VMs with critical issues.

title: Top 10 VMs with VM Malware Findings
description: Displays the top 10 VMs with VM Malware Findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful VMs with critical issues.

title: Top 3 Cloud Accounts with Failed Controls
display_title: Top 3 Cloud Accounts with Failed Controls
description: Shows the top 3 cloud accounts with the highest number of failed controls, highlighting accounts with the most critical security issues.

title: Cloud Account Risk Assessment
description: Displays the status of cloud compliance checks, helping identify risks and gaps through categorized findings.

title: Top 10 Risks Associated to Cloud Accounts
description: Displays the most critical cloud misconfigurations based on severity and impacted asset count, helping teams prioritize remediation efforts.

title: Findings
description: Displays the number of findings along with their severity distribution, helping users identify and prioritize security risks.

title: Assets by Cloud Provider
description: Shows total assets per cloud provider and how many have security findings, helping identify risk concentration across different cloud providers.

description: Displays the total number of onboarded cloud accounts, categorized into active and inactive accounts. This helps users monitor account status and ensure proper management of cloud resources.

title: SAST Findings by Security Category
description: Displays static code analysis findings categorized by security category, along with their severity distribution, helping users prioritize remediation.

title: SAST Findings Trend by Severity
description: Displays static code analysis findings over time, categorized by severity, helping users monitor risk trends and remediation progress.

title: Top 5 SAST Findings
description: Displays the top 5 static code analysis findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful issues.

title: Top 5 SAST Findings by Count
description: Displays the top 5 static code analysis findings sorted by occurrence count, helping users identify the most frequent issues.

title: Top 5 Vulnerable Endpoints
description: Displays the top 5 endpoints with the highest number of findings, sorted by total count. Also shows the severity distribution for each endpoint, helping users assess risk exposure.

title: Top 5 Vulnerable Endpoints - Burp
description: Displays the top 5 endpoints with the highest number of findings, sorted by total count. Also shows the severity distribution for each endpoint, helping users assess risk exposure.

description: Displays the top 5 DAST findings sorted by occurrence count, helping users identify the most frequent security issues.

description: Displays the top 5 DAST findings sorted by occurrence count, helping users identify the most frequent security issues.

description: Displays DAST findings over time, categorized by severity, helping users monitor risk trends and remediation progress.

title: High-Risk Endpoints by HTTP Methods
description: Displays findings categorized by HTTP methods (GET, POST, etc.), showing the distribution of findings by severity to highlight potential risks across different request types.

title: High-Risk Endpoints by HTTP Methods - Burp
description: Displays findings categorized by HTTP methods (GET, POST, etc.), showing the distribution of findings by severity to highlight potential risks across different request types.

title: Top 5 Vulnerable IaC Repositories
description: Displays the top 5 repositories with the highest number of IaC security findings, categorized by severity to highlight risk distribution.

title: IaC Findings by Framework
description: Displays the number of IaC findings categorized by framework, providing insight into which frameworks have the most issues.

title: Top 5 Files with Most IaC Findings
display_title: Top 5 Files with Most IaC Findings
description: Lists the top 5 files with the highest number of IaC findings, sorted by count. Helps users identify the most problematic files and prioritize remediation efforts.

title: IaC Findings Trend by Severity
description: Displays IaC findings over time, categorized by severity, helping users track risk trends and remediation progress.

title: Top 5 IaC Findings
description: Displays the top 5 IaC findings, sorted first by severity and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful issues.

title: Top 5 IaC Findings by Count
description: Displays the top 5 IaC findings sorted by occurrence count, helping users identify the most frequent issues.

title: Verified Secrets Breakdown
description: Displays the number of verified secrets categorized by the detector type, helping users understand the distribution of exposed secrets across different sources.

title: Verified vs Unverified Secrets
description: Displays the number of verified and unverified secrets, helping users prioritize verified secrets for immediate attention.

title: Top 5 Repositories with Secrets
description: Displays the repositories with the highest number of detected secrets, helping users identify where sensitive data exposure is most prevalent.

title: Secret Exposure Trend by Severity
description: Displays the trend of detected secrets over time, categorized by severity, helping users track and prioritize secret exposures.

title: Secrets by Decoder Type
description: Displays verified and unverified secrets for each decoder type, helping users understand the distribution of detected secrets across different decoders.

title: Secrets by Contributor
description: Displays the top 5 contributors responsible for exposed secrets in the codebase, showing the number of detected secrets per contributor. Helps teams enforce better security practices among developers.

title: Top CVEs by Severity and Affected Images
display_title: Top CVEs by Severity and Affected Images
description: This widget displays the top 10 CVEs ranked by severity and the number of container images affected. It helps prioritize remediation efforts by highlighting vulnerabilities that pose the greatest risk and have the widest impact across container images.

title: Top 25 CWEs
description: This widget displays the Top 25 most dangerous Common Weakness Enumerations (CWEs) based on the MITRE 2024 list. These represent the most critical and prevalent software vulnerabilities that attackers commonly exploit.Use this insight to identify common vulnerability patterns and strengthen security posture.

title: Top 10 Container Images by Vulnerabilities
description: Displays the top 10 container images with the highest number of associated vulnerabilities, helping teams quickly identify and prioritize remediation efforts for the most impacted images.

title: Top Vulnerable Packages by count
description: This widget displays the top 10 container images with the highest number of known vulnerabilities, assisting in identifying and prioritizing remediation efforts for the most at-risk images in your environment.

title: VM Cluster Node Status
description: This widget lists only active VM clusters and provides visibility into the number of active nodes compared to the total nodes within each cluster. It helps track resource availability and operational status across live environments.

title: Top 5 Suppressed Alerts by Trigger
description: This displays the top 5 triggers responsible for the most suppressed alerts within a selected time interval. Helps users quickly identify the key triggers contributing to suppressed alerts, providing insights for improved security and operational management.

title: Overall Cloud Compliance Summary
description: Provides a snapshot of your latest cloud compliance posture, including overall score, failed checks, and top non-compliant categories and checks by severity.

title: AWS CIS Benchmark Latest
description: Provides a focused summary of your compliance posture against the AWS CIS Benchmark v4.0.1, including your overall score, total failed checks, top non-compliant categories, and the top failed checks prioritized by severity.

title: Azure CIS Benchmark Latest
description: Provides a focused summary of your compliance posture against the Azure CIS Benchmark v3.0, including your overall score, total failed checks, top non-compliant categories, and the top failed checks prioritized by severity.

title: GCP CIS Benchmark Latest
description: Provides a focused summary of your compliance posture against the GCP CIS Benchmark v3.0, including your overall score, total failed checks, top non-compliant categories, and the top failed checks prioritized by severity.

title: ISO Benchmark latest
description: Provides a focused summary of your compliance posture against the ISO 27001 - 2022, including your overall score, total failed checks, top non-compliant categories, and the top failed checks prioritized by severity.

title: NIST SP Latest
description: Provides a focused summary of your compliance posture against the NIST SP 800-53, including your overall score, total failed checks, top non-compliant categories, and the top failed checks prioritized by severity.

title: Findings by Cloud Provider
description: Displays the total number and severity of findings for each cloud provider, helping you identify which environments have the most critical issues.

title: Top 10 Cloud Accounts with Most Findings
display_title: Top Cloud Accounts with Most Findings
description: Highlights the top 10 cloud accounts with the most findings. When cloud account filters are applied, the widget ranks and displays the top 10 among the selected accounts, helping target remediation where it's most needed.

title: Top Assets with Findings
description: Highlights the top 10 assets with the most findings. When cloud account filters are applied, the widget ranks and displays the top 10 among the selected accounts, helping target remediation where it's most needed.

title: New Host Findings Trend
description: Track how many new host findings are discovered over time. This helps you identify spikes in host-related risks and monitor emerging issues across your infrastructure.

title: Host Findings Trend
description: Shows the trend of unresolved host findings over time, helping you track ongoing risks in your infrastructure.

title: Total vs. Impacted Hosts
description: Shows total scanned hosts vs. impacted hosts with unresolved findings, giving a quick view of risk exposure across your host environment.

title: Top 10 Host Findings
description: Displays the top 10 Host findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful issues.

title: Host Findings with Exploit Available
description: Highlights unresolved host findings with known exploits, helping prioritize remediation. Breakdown is shown by severity to assess risk exposure effectively.

title: Host Findings by Plugin Family
description: Displays host vulnerability findings grouped by plugin family, helping users identify which plugin families contribute most to their security posture.

title: Host Findings by Severity
description: View the breakdown of host findings across severity levels: Critical, High, Medium, and Low to quickly assess and prioritize remediation efforts.

title: VM Malware Findings by Severity
description: View the breakdown of findings across severity levels: Critical, High, Medium, and Low to quickly assess and prioritize remediation efforts.

description: Shows the trend of VM Malware findings over time, helping you track risks in your infrastructure.

title: Top 10 VM Malware Findings
description: Displays the top 10 VM Malware Findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful issues.

title: VM Vulnerability Findings by Severity
description: View the breakdown of findings across severity levels: Critical, High, Medium, and Low to quickly assess and prioritize remediation efforts.

description: View the breakdown of findings across severity levels: Critical, High, Medium, and Low to quickly assess and prioritize remediation efforts.

description: Shows the trend of Windows VM Vulnerability findings over time, helping you track risks in your infrastructure.

title: VM Vulnerability Findings Trend
description: Shows the trend of findings over time, helping you track risks in your infrastructure.

title: Top 10 VM Vulnerability Findings
description: Displays the top 10 Linux VM Vulnerability Findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful issues.

title: Top 10 Windows VM Vulnerability Findings
description: Displays the top 10 Windows VM Vulnerability Findings, sorted first by criticality and then by occurrence count, helping users focus on the most impactful issues.

description: Displays the total number of findings along with their severity distribution, helping users identify and prioritize security risks.

description: Displays the top 5 DAST findings sorted by occurrence count, helping users identify the most frequent security issues.

description: Displays DAST findings over time, categorized by severity, helping users monitor risk trends and remediation progress.

description: Displays findings categorized by HTTP methods (GET, POST, etc.), showing the distribution of findings by severity to highlight potential risks across different request types.

description: Displays the top 5 repositories with the highest number of SAST findings, categorized by severity to highlight risk distribution.

description: Displays the number of exposed secrets categorized by severity, helping teams assess risk levels and prioritize remediation efforts effectively.

description: Displays the domains with the highest number of DAST findings, helping security teams identify and prioritize externally exposed assets with the most critical vulnerabilities.

title: Container Image Findings Trend
description: Displays Container Image Findings over time, categorized by severity, helping users track risk trends and remediation progress.

title: Top 20 CVEs with CVSS Baseline Score vs Severity
display_title: Top 20 CVEs with CVSS Baseline vs Severity
description: This widget highlights the Top 20 CVEs by prioritizing those with the highest CVSS scores, followed by severity level, and then by the number of affected instances. It enables teams to focus on vulnerabilities that pose the greatest risk due to their criticality and widespread presence.

title: Asset Exposure Trend by Cloud Provider
description: Shows asset count trends across cloud providers (AWS, GCP, Azure) over time.

title: Issue Distribution Trend
description: Displays the trend of issues identified across different model types (LLM, ML) over the selected date range.

description: Provides the count of issues for types of Model (LLM, ML) by severity over the selected date range.

description: Provides the count of issues for types of Model (LLM, ML) over the selected date range.

description: This widget displays the total count of applications onboarded.

description: This widget displays the total count of queries made.

title: Application Onboarding Trend

description: This graph displays a time-based trend comparing the total number of queries made, to the number of queries that resulted in policy violations, over the last 30 days.
